acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo

Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo ( nonGenerifiedCollection = [OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 60 byteObjectField = 50 shortField = 35 shortObjectField = 45 charField = k charObjectField = U intField = 1016840879 intObjectField = 1176995469 longField = 324933641284880 longObjectField = 324933640065848 floatField = 0.98911136 floatObjectField = 0.2482872 doubleField = 0.21997458736884723 doubleObjectField = 0.6008365382843526 stringField = dybGtBc5WR objectField = java.lang.Object@6a35f9fd calendarField = Mon Jun 01 23:05:23 BST 2015 dateField = Mon Jun 01 23:05:23 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@578fb678 intArray = [I@533e74c5 booleanArray = [Z@2667d4fe bigDecimalField = 82115842599 ) should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 2 byteObjectField = 34 shortField = 37 shortObjectField = 27 charField = R charObjectField = W intField = -491955395 intObjectField = -1986592894 longField = 324933642787359 longObjectField = 324933642735703 floatField = 0.32540536 floatObjectField = 0.8048312 doubleField = 0.2584481154119753 doubleObjectField = 0.8689499715397507 stringField = AUzmE5Ol7R objectField = java.lang.Object@6a35f9fd calendarField = Mon Jun 01 23:05:23 BST 2015 dateField = Mon Jun 01 23:05:23 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@63583bde intArray = [I@494e6dbb booleanArray = [Z@69f6b00b bigDecimalField = 82115842599 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{kGpg7k5vFX=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1433196323409 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@3d1c7e7b elements
